      • parseToConfiguration

        public static Configuration parseToConfiguration(String[] args,
                                 Class<? extends Name<?>>... argClasses)
                                          throws org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        Utility method to quickly parse a command line to a Configuration.

        This is equivalent to parseToConfigurationBuilder(args, argClasses).build()

        Parameters:
        args - the command line parameters to parse.
        argClasses - the named parameters to look for.
        Returns:
        a Configuration with the parsed parameters
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - if the parsing of the commandline fails.

      • parseToConfigurationBuilder

        public static ConfigurationBuilder parseToConfigurationBuilder(String[] args,
                                               Class<? extends Name<?>>... argClasses)
                                                        throws org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        Utility method to quickly parse a command line to a ConfigurationBuilder.

        This is equivalent to new CommandLine().processCommandLine(args, argClasses).getBuilder(), but with additional checks.

        Parameters:
        args - the command line parameters to parse.
        argClasses - the named parameters to look for.
        Returns:
        a ConfigurationBuilder with the parsed parameters
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - if the parsing of the commandline fails.
